## PeriodData interface

Data that represents data for any picker type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PeriodData<TDate = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [active](./datetime.perioddata.active.md) | boolean | Indication that this period item is active and selected |
|  [date](./datetime.perioddata.date.md) | TDate | Date for this period item |
|  [disabled](./datetime.perioddata.disabled.md) | boolean | Indication that this period item is disabled |
